name: Revenge: Armchair Assassin 2
overview: The sequel to Armchair Assassin (The T.V. Chubbies in...). A highly entertaining murder simulator. Cute sprites burst from a wooden crate and run aimlessly in all directions. You move a crosshair and shoot at them with an arsenal of weapons and an endless amount of ammunition. Soon the screen is filled with blood, bones, and craters. You can change the music, the sounds, and even the sprites.
